events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the product is damaged. There are visible scratches and the device does not turn on.
The reported issue has been categorized as a Product Defect due to the description of scratches and malfunction.
An agent from the product support team has been assigned to handle the damaged product issue.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damaged product you received. I’m here to help resolve this issue for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the overall packaging condition so we can assess the problem more accurately?
I have attached several pictures showing the scratches on the product surface as well as the unopened box, which looks intact.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you either a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement if it can be shipped soon. Thank you for the quick response and helpful options.
We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped within the next 24 hours. A tracking number will be sent shortly.
Checking in to confirm you have received your replacement product and that it meets your expectations. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Since the replacement has been delivered and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
